General.Name: SDIC Power Holdings Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: SDIC Power Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the electricity business in China. It generates electricity with an installed capacity of 21.28 giga watt (GW) of hydropower; 11.8808 GW of thermal power; and 2.9494 GW of wind power; and 1.654 GW of solar power. SDIC Power Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Building 147, Xizhimen South Street, Beijing, China, 100034
